thread.title: Sooraj and Sandhya get married again in 'Diya Aur Baati Hum'
thread.title_full: Sooraj and Sandhya get married again in 'Diya Aur Baati Hum' - Entertainment

author: A Correspondent
title: Sooraj and Sandhya get married again in 'Diya Aur Baati Hum'
text:
Sooraj (Anas Rashid) and Sandhya Rathi (Deepika Singh) from 'Diya Aur Baati Hum' have married again on the show. The estranged couple were away from each other for the last 5 months.

Sooraj and Sandhya get married again in 'Diya Aur Baati Hum' 
Talking about the storyline, actor Anas Rashid said, "Sandhya and Sooraj are finally back together. There is soon going to be a new track unfolded on the show and this sequence is only a glimpse to what the audience will get to watch in the upcoming episodes. The audiences have always loved the show and we only hope that they continue to love and support us even more."
